UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The cationic tetradecapeptide mastoparan as a privileged structure for drug discovery: Enhanced antimicrobial properties of mitoparan analogues modified at position-14.
Literature.Author: Howl J, Howl L, Jones S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=15.3-32 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:97.4-99.7% Cytotoxicity=32 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8.0±0.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=5.33±1.33µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=26.67±5.33µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.83±0.17µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=8.0±0.0µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=0.67±0.17µg/ml)
